response.original_title: My Friend from a Care Home
response.overview: Nina is 28 and has spent most of her life in care homes, but the pandemic changes everything for her, as staying in a care home is no longer safe. Arina, a young professional from Moscow, invites Nina to temporarily live with her. When restrictions are finally lifted, Nina has to go back to care home, but after spending lockdown together, the young women had grown very close. They settle on a plan to take Nina out of the institutional system for good.
response.title: My Friend from a Care Home
